p: In the present work, the antioxidant, antimicrobial, and antiproliferative activities of EOs from Corymbia citriodora, Eucalyptus dives, Eucalyptus globulus, Eucalyptus delegatensis subsp. tasmaniensis, Eucalyptus pauciflora, Eucalyptus radiata, Eucalyptus smithii, Eucalyptus urophylla, and Eucalyptus viminalis (all from Portugal) were evaluated.
